settings.content: The SOLE Extended Warranty coverage ensures that you can use your fitness equipment without worrying about any labor costs for repairs for an additional year or two depending on which product you are purchasing. Protect your investment and enjoy peace of mind with our extended warranty.

settings.text: Why Purchase Extended Warranty From SOLE?

settings.content:
Purchasing an extended warranty from SOLE Fitness means you'll have peace of mind when it comes to keeping your fitness equipment in top working order. While our standard warranty covers parts, wear items for an extended time, the labor is only covered for one year. The extended warranty specifically covers labor for one or two additional years, ensuring you avoid unexpected costs if something needs professional attention.

Here’s why it’s a smart choice:

  1. Zero Labor Costs: If your equipment requires servicing after the initial warranty period, labor fees can add up quickly. The extended warranty takes care of those costs, keeping your maintenance expenses predictable and low.
  2. Comprehensive Coverage: Our extended warranty brings labor coverage in line with the equipment warranty. You get full support for longer—covering not only the parts but also the expertise needed to install them.
  3. Protect Your Investment: Fitness equipment is an investment in your health. With our extended warranty, you'll ensure your treadmill, bike, or elliptical stays in great condition without having to worry about costly repair bills.
  4. Hassle-Free Service: With the extended warranty, arranging repairs is simple and straightforward. We'll handle everything from start to finish—so you can focus on your workouts, not on unexpected service fees.

With SOLE Fitness’s extended warranty, you’re not just buying fitness equipment—you’re buying long-term support and peace of mind. Protect your equipment, protect your wallet, and keep your fitness journey on track without interruption.

We get it—deciding whether or not to purchase an extended warranty can feel like an extra expense. But before you decide, consider a few key points that make this extended labor warranty a smart choice:

  1. Unexpected Repairs Can Be Costly: Fitness equipment, like treadmills and ellipticals, are made up of complex moving parts. Over time, even the highest-quality machines may need some fine-tuning or repairs. The labor involved can be expensive, and an extended warranty ensures that you won’t have to foot those costs unexpectedly.
  2. Peace of Mind: Do you want to worry about unexpected service costs while focusing on your fitness goals? The extended warranty helps you enjoy your workouts without the stress of thinking, "What if something breaks?" You'll have the peace of mind knowing any labor costs are already covered.
  3. Longer Protection = Better Value: Our standard warranty protects the equipment's parts and wear items, but with the extended labor warranty, you’re getting full-service coverage for longer. It means the initial cost of your equipment won’t be followed by unforeseen expenses down the road.
  4. Protect Your Investment: Purchasing fitness equipment is an investment in your health. An extended warranty helps safeguard that investment, ensuring that you’ll get the most out of your equipment for years to come without unexpected hits to your budget.

While it’s not mandatory, an extended warranty can make a real difference—especially when it comes to unexpected breakdowns and repair bills. It’s about having complete, hassle-free protection, so you can focus on what truly matters: staying fit and reaching your goals without the stress of unplanned labor costs.

settings.title: How do I file a Fitness Equipment claim and what documentation do I need?
settings.content:
Please contact our Support Team:

Phone: 866-780-7653 Option #2
Email: service@soletreadmills.com
Monday - Friday 7:00am to 5:00pm MST

Please be prepared to provide:

  • The Order Number
  • The Name of the person who purchased the equipment
  • The Date of purchase of the equipment and Extended Warranty

settings.title: When does SOLE Extended Warranty coverage begin?
settings.content: The Extended Warranty begins on the day after the Original Manufacturer's Labor Warranty expires.

settings.title: What is covered by the Extended Warranty?
settings.content:
The original Manufacturer's Warranty covers labor for only one year after the purchase of the fitness equipment for free.

However, the parts and wear items are covered for an additional year or two depending on the product.

SOLE's Extended Warranty for one or two years brings in line the parts and wear items warranty with covered labor up to the expiration of the manufacturers' warranty.

All repair costs for labor are covered for approved warranty claims.

This Extended Warranty is meant to be purchased alongside a new SOLE fitness equipment. Strength Equipment is excluded from this offer.

If purchased separately, it can only be purchased within 30-days of the original purchase of a new SOLE Fitness equipment. 

This extended warranty is void if either of the first two requirements above are not met at the time of the purchase of this product.

settings.liquid:
<script>
  window.addEventListener('load', function() {
  var _learnq = window._learnq || [];
  function addedToCart() {
   fetch(`${window.location.origin}/cart.js`)
   .then(res => res.clone().json().then(data => {
    var cart = {
      total_price: data.total_price/100,
      $value: data.total_price/100,
      total_discount: data.total_discount,
      original_total_price: data.original_total_price/100,
      items: data.items
    }
    if (item !== 'undefined') {
      cart = Object.assign(cart, item)
    }
    if (klAjax) {
       _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', cart]);
       klAjax = false;
      }
   }))
  };
  (function (ns, fetch) {
    ns.fetch = function() {
      const response = fetch.apply(this, arguments);
      response.then(res => {
        if (`${window.location.origin}/cart/add.js`
          .includes(res.url) && res.url !== '') {
              addedToCart()
        }
      });
      return response
     }
  }(window, window.fetch));
  var klAjax = true;
  var atcButtons = document.querySelectorAll("form[action*='/cart/add'] button[type='submit']");
  for (var i = 0; i < atcButtons.length; i++) { 
    atcButtons[i].addEventListener("click", function() {
      if (klAjax) {
        _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', item]);
        klAjax = false;
      }
    })
  }
  });
</script>
